name: Endless (Music) Racetrack
description:
Endless (Music) Racetrack

This was a "project" of mine to try new things like Procedural Generation and some sort of a 'Music Beat Reaction' and try the new URP. I think it was a success because I could achieve what I was looking for, so here it is!

Controls:

W A S D - Move

Right Click  - Boost
